I'm an analytics and insight specialist with nearly a decade of experience across a number of roles and sectors. In September 2023 I decided to take a career break to expand my skillset (like building this website!) and explore new opportunities.

I'm currently pursuing an MSc in Urban Data Science and Analytics at the University of Leeds, whilst working as a Freelance Consultant. My studies have deepened my analytical and research capabilities whilst giving me the time and space to delve into all things geospatial!

You can find some of my work, or just things I've been playing around with and trying to learn, on this website.
